text: The Drifter is a 1929 American silent western film directed by Robert De Lacey and starring Tom Mix, Dorothy Dwan and Barney Furey.Jensen p.235 It was one of the final films produced by FBO before the company was absorbed into the larger RKO Pictures. ==Cast== * Tom Mix as Tom McCall * Dorothy Dwan as Ruth Martin * Barney Furey as Happy Hogan * Albert J. Smith as Pete Lawson * Ernest Wilson as Uncle Abe * Frank Austin as Seth Martin * Joe Rickson as Hank * Wynn Mace as Henchman == References == == Bibliography == * Jensen, Richard D.
